## Tender Information
* **Contract Title**: Numerical Reservoir Simulation Software Package (ACAN)
* **Contracting Organization**: Department of Natural Resources (RNCan), Geological Survey of Canada
* **End User Organization**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Notice Details
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Selection Criteria**: Low Price
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Description
An Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) indicates that the Department of Natural Resources (RNCan), Geological Survey of Canada, intends to award a contract to the pre-identified supplier for the supply of a numerical reservoir simulation software package. The contract is for a period of one year, with the option to extend by 1 additional year. Suppliers may submit a statement of capabilities to express their interest in bidding on or before the tender closing date.
